review_comment: Staff were extremely welcoming and professional. The check-in was quick and smooth.
Rooms were clean and bed was very comfortable. Breakfast was decent.
Good location but Wi-Fi was weak most of the time.
Couldn't sleep due to noise from outside and from the hallway.
Bathroom was not cleaned properly and there was hair on the floor.
The restaurant served the best national dishes—fresh and delicious!
The room was spacious and the price was fair. Would recommend.
Facilities were fine but the spa was fully booked every day.
Service at the restaurant was very slow. Waited 40 minutes for food.
The room had a strong odor and AC was not working.
Staff treated us very well and helped arrange transportation.
Rooms were clean and tidy. Enjoyed my stay.
Internet connection needs improvement. Kept disconnecting.
Lobby area is very elegant and relaxing.
Food was okay but choices were limited.
Close to the airport and shopping malls.
Room was fine but lacked some amenities.
Hot water was inconsistent. Shower was cold in the morning.
Best customer service I have experienced in Addis.
Room smelled damp and window couldn’t open.
Buffet had many options. Loved the pastries.
Friendly staff but slow room service.
Furniture looks old and worn out.
Everything was clean, warm, and welcoming.
AC wasn’t working and the room was noisy.
